Summary: Large bright red-orange light descending slowly treetop-level over hills
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving southbound on the 15fwy about to pass Toms Farms. On the opposite side of the freeway I see a huge red ball of light slowly descending. I sped up to see it's path as the hills it was over obstructed my view and when I did so I lost sight of it. *Note: This is the second time I have seen a UFO in this exact location. The first time was about a year ago on the other side of the hills and was 3 (points) of white lights that formed a triangle and seemed to quickly pass right alongside the freeway going north.
